MOVED_TYPES.description: corefx types that changed their location

MOVED_VALID.description: moves that have been deemed ok (list hardcoded)

MOVED_TO_SYSTEM_RUNTIME.description: all moves to System.Runtime are OK

ORPHANED_TYPES.description: Orphaned types are types in the specifications that don't exist in master source.

TYPES_NOT_IN_ANY_ASSEMBLY.description: types that are not in specification files
